featured.text: This extinct volcano is considered the wettest spot on earth, with almost 500 inches of rainfall each year.
The town sits on the side of a volcano nearly 10,000 feet above sea level, making daily life a kind of high-altitude training.

definition.zh_def: 火山是一種地質結構，當岩漿從地球內部噴發到地表時形成。
definition.en_def: A volcano is a geological structure that forms when magma erupts from the Earth's interior to the surface.
definition.example: The volcano erupted, sending ash and lava into the sky.
